page.title: 17Buxhall - Parish Council
page.content: The Parish Council, meeting 6 times a year, has 7 members with average length of service about 15yrs. 5 members maintain a family tradition as Parish Councillors. The{last election was contested with one new member being elected. At the last meeting, attended by 3 parishioners, discussion included: Concern over the continued deterior- ation of an important{historic barn}in the village, the District Council having recently refused consent for its demolition; The retention of a{mobile home}on an isolated site, recently purchased by a new owner; {Footpath}clearance; volunteers for {snow clearance}if required; safety of council owned{play equipment}on the playing field; plans for a{pavillion on the playing field.
